modules.description: Constructs the file path to an opam package's metadata file within a given opam repository directory. Works with OpamPackage.t values and string paths. Useful for locating package definition files when validating or processing opam packages during CI checks.

This module defines linting check categories for OPAM files and provides functions to determine source code inspection requirements and detect package name collisions. It operates on string-based package names and works with lists of check kinds to enforce consistency across OPAM repositories. Concrete use cases include validating package metadata during submission to public OPAM repositories and checking for naming conflicts in package archives.

This module performs linting checks on OPAM package metadata, identifying issues like naming conflicts, incorrect file structure, and constraint violations. It works with OPAM package definitions and string paths to validate package integrity during CI workflows, particularly in public repository submissions. Concrete operations include detecting unmatched package names, missing dependencies, and invalid dune configurations.
